game.name: Hand-me-downs
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A roguelike deck builder where you are your own worst enemy. Manage your deck as your opponents use your old hands against you. Use powerful trinkets to take full control of the table.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A roguelike deck builder where you are your own worst enemy. Manage your deck as your opponents use your old hands against you. Use powerful trinkets to take full control of the table.
